strategyDetails:
Icicle Crash and Earthquake are a devastatingly powerful STAB combination, easily KOing common walls like Amoonguss, Primarina, and Mandibuzz. Ice Shard can threaten many faster threats like Galarian Moltres, Thundurus-T, and Zarude, and it can also OHKO offensive Salamence and Zygarde-10%. Knock Off is used to punish and cripple switch-ins like Rotom-H or Rotom-W, allowing Mamoswine or another teammate to break past it more easily later. Thick Fat offers better protection against Rotom-H and ensures it can take a Fire Blast from Moltres. Life Orb is preferred, as it allows Mamoswine to safely 2HKO almost anything in the tier, including Celesteela and Chansey. However, Never-Melt Ice also is an option to retain a powerful Icicle Crash while not wearing itself down with Life Orb, but this comes at the cost of a much weaker Earthquake, missing out on a 2HKO on Slowking, even after Stealth Rock. An Adamant Nature maximizes Mamoswine's wallbreaking potential, though a Jolly nature can be used to outspeed unboosted Galarian Moltres and Timid Volcanion at the cost of lots of power.

Mamoswine best functions on offensive teams that provide it many opportunities to wallbreak. Late-game cleaners like Salazzle and Azelf appreciate Mamoswine's early-game wallbreaking and can deal with faster threats like Cobalion and Keldeo as well as walls like Skarmory. Salazzle also can wear down Slowking, allowing Mamoswine to break through it easier. Pivots like Zarude and Slowking lure in Grass-types like Tapu Bulu and Amoonguss and then pivot to Mamoswine for a more favorable matchup; Slowking in particular provides slow pivoting with Teleport to get Mamoswine in safely. Mamoswine is vulnerable to priority moves from Conkeldurr, Crawdaunt, and Azumarill; Amoonguss can switch into most of these. Entry hazard support from Cobalion and Nihilego can wear down Pokemon like Skarmory and Umbreon for Mamoswine to break past them more easily. Similarly, entry hazard control from Excadrill and Tentacruel can remove opposing entry hazards that would wear Mamoswine down. Aegislash helps check faster threats like Lycanroc-D and Jirachi and works well with Mamoswine to overwhelm walls like Primarina and Celesteela.

pokemonAbilities.abilityDetails: Fire/Ice-type moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved attacking stat.
This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or taunted. Immune to Intimidate.
If Hail is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Hail.
